mapper.select: SELECT USER_RESUME_IDX , USER_TITLE , USER_RESUME_REGDATE FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID=#{ user_id } ORDER BY USER_RESUME_IDX DESC
SELECT USER_RESUME_IDX FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{ user_id } ORDER BY USER_RESUME_IDX DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY

SELECT UR.USER_RESUME_IDX , UR.USER_TITLE , UR.USER_ID , UR.USER_NAME , UR.USER_BIRTH , UR.USER_PHONE , UR.USER_EMAIL , UR.REGION_IDX , UR.REGION_ADDRESS , UR.USER_INTRO , UR.USER_RESUME_REGDATE , LISTAGG(SKILLS.SKILL_NAME, ' ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SKILLS.SKILL_NAME) AS skillList FROM USER_RESUME UR LEFT JOIN COMMON_USER_RESUME_SKILL CURS ON UR.USER_RESUME_IDX = CURS.USER_RESUME_IDX LEFT JOIN SKILLS ON CURS.SKILL_NAME = SKILLS.SKILL_NAME WHERE UR.USER_RESUME_IDX = ${user_resume_idx} GROUP BY UR.USER_RESUME_IDX , UR.USER_TITLE , UR.USER_ID , UR.USER_NAME , UR.USER_BIRTH , UR.USER_PHONE , UR.USER_EMAIL , UR.REGION_IDX , UR.REGION_ADDRESS , UR.USER_INTRO , UR.USER_RESUME_REGDATE
SELECT SK.SKILL_NAME, SK.SKILL_STACK FROM COMMON_USER_RESUME_SKILL CURS JOIN SKILLS SK ON CURS.SKILL_NAME = SK.SKILL_NAME WHERE CURS.USER_RESUME_IDX = #{user_resume_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMON_USER_RESUME_SKILL SET SKILL_NAME = #{ skill_name } WHERE USER_RESUME_IDX = #{ user_resume_idx } ORDER BY USER_RESUME_IDX DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMON_USER_RESUME_SKILL WHERE USER_RESUME_IDX = #{ user_resume_idx }
DELETE FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_RESUME_IDX = #{ user_resume_idx }
